summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department; authorizing the Superintendent to complete preparation of and to file a license amendment application to the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission for the addition of two generating units to the Boundary Hydroelectric Project, increasing certain objects of expenditure in the 1981 Budget of the City Light Department for license amendment preparation and certain other consultant activities related to purchase of major equipment items, and making an appropriation from the Light Fund therefor.
